text: For example, if a user decides to write an email to Cherryware, the header of the email and its content will be stored and processed by Cherryware's server.

In each case, Cherryware collects such information only insofar as is necessary or appropriate to fulfill the purpose of the visitor's interaction with Cherryware.
Those who engage in transactions with Cherryware - by purchasing Showmaster, are asked to provide additional information including as necessary the personal and financial information required to process those transactions.

Cherryware will maintain all records required by Article 30(2) of the GDPR and, to the extent applicable to the processing of Personal Data on behalf of Customer, make them available to Customer upon request.
